channel.title: Body/Leg Items Wear as a Weapon
channel.description: Some items that are helms, platebodies wield as a weapon how do i change this, i looked in one of my item files and put the ints for those items in the public int (platebody) or whatever.. but it didnt work

item.title: Body/Leg Items Wear as a Weapon
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

to get them to wield in correct place put them unde body and platebody in item.java, to get them so they dont show your shirt, put them in item4.java under body and platebody

Read full topic
item.source: Body/Leg Items Wear as a Weapon
